title-group.article-title: ON EQUATIONS OF DOUBLE PLANES WITH p g = q = 1

abstract.p: This paper describes how to compute equations of plane models of minimal Du Val double planes of general type with p g = q = 1 and K² = 2 , . . . , 8. A double plane with K² = 8 having bicanonical map not composed with the associated involution is also constructed. The computations are done using the algebra system Magma.
